trends: There have been no other sightings in Trainer
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: saw moving star, flaired up bright then dimmed out until it vanished
divs: Sighting Details2 nights ago around 10:30 i went out back for a smoke when I was looking at the planes flying over a bright light caught my eye. It was going west to east tword New Jersey accross the normal flight paths for planes around here. It was like a star but much brighter. I watched it go slow and steady all the way across the sky, then as it got over Jersey it dimmed and vanished. Earlier tonight I was telling my wife about it and went out back for a smoke around 10:30 pm and saw it again! I was watching a plane going to Philly airport when my eye was caught by a moving star to the right. It then flaired up to the exact same brightness from 2 nights ago, and it wasn't a question I instantly new it was the same thing, then dimmed out and vanished right before my eyes.
